arts.ttl: Leo Østigård arrives proper at Hoffenheim: “He stabilises our game.”
arts.sum: After returning much earlier than expected to his team, TSG 1899 Hoffenheim captain Oliver Baumann had special praise for one of the new faces closing ranks ahead of him.

arts.ttl: Harry Potter 'crashed' the incredible birthday party that Antonela Roccuzzo enjoyed with Leo Messi and his sons
arts.sum: Through her Instagram account, where she is followed by nearly 40 million people, Antonela shared a family photo with Messi and their three children, Thiago (11), Mateo (9) and Ciro (6) Antonela Roccuzzo loves the magic of Harry Potter

arts.ttl: Vinicius Junior reaches enormous Real Madrid milestone
arts.sum: Vinicius Junior reached an impressive milestone in his Real Madrid career on Sunday.
